item.content:encoded:

Ergonomic Lumbar Support: The double-backrest is designed according to the curve of the human spine, it really fits the body. Supports the back and lumbar at the same time, you can fully feel the support and curvature of the lumbar, computer chair provides stronger comfort and balance the pressure on different parts of your body.
Breathable Mesh Seat: The full mesh office chair is made of nylon mesh for better insulation and moisture resistance.The surface is soft and skin-friendly to avoid sweating and sticking. High quality mesh has long time support, long sitting without deformation, suitable for long office hours.
300Lbs Weight Capacity: The strong gas cylinder of the ergonomic office chair has been thoroughly safety tested, while the thick chassis provides strong pressure resistance and higher security. Aluminum legs, 360° silent casters roll smoothly and effectively protect floors.
Multi-Adjustable Design: This office chair comfortable features an 18.1 ~ 22 inches adjustable seat height, +/-2” adjustable headrest for better support, and 3D armrests that are adjustable toward the front, back, up, down, left, and right. Truly ergonomic mesh office chairs promote healthy posture.
130° Reclining Tilt: Are you tired during long office hours? Easily tilt the desk chair up to 130° by pulling out the lift handle, and push the handle back to lock the position. You can enjoy a moment of relaxation at work and helps increase productivity.

item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) Short PlushGEL ENHANCED SEAT CUSHION – If you want premium high-density memory foam plus gel, our pick is the Gel Enhanced Seat Cushion. The memory foam is durable, comfortable, and long-lasting while the gel prevents the cushion from feeling too hot. A soft, machine-washable short plush cover makes it easy ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $39.99 - $27.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:35:39 UTC – Details)



Short Plush
GEL ENHANCED SEAT CUSHION – If you want premium high-density memory foam plus gel, our pick is the Gel Enhanced Seat Cushion. The memory foam is durable, comfortable, and long-lasting while the gel prevents the cushion from feeling too hot. A soft, machine-washable short plush cover makes it easy to keep clean. Non-slip rubber dots on the bottom means it won’t slide out of your chair as you shift around
QUITE PORTABLE CHAIR CUSHION – The carrying handle makes it easy to move from seat to seat and it’s perfectly sized for a work chair or use in a wheelchair. Great for office, home, travel, car seat or wheelchair use. You can even use it outdoors, but the cover isn’t waterproof, so save it for dry weather
ERGONOMIC “U” SHAPED CUTOUT DESIGN – Whether you’re working from home, sitting in an office chair, a car or truck, or any kind of seat at all, the U-shaped cutout for your tailbone is specifically designed to maximize comfort and support while reducing pressure on your tailbone. The CYLEN office chair cushion can make your day more enjoyable and keep away those aches and pains
IT’S A COMMON BYPRODUCT OF FATIGUE – You might slouch or begin leaning forward at an uncomfortable angle at your desk, and you might not even register the discomfort right away because your mind is intently elsewhere. This comfort seat cushion features ergonomic design to help soothe already-existing aches and pains that came about after months or even years of slouching and leaning
TIPS – Since it’s made of high-density memory foam, keep in mind that the firmness of the cushion can be affected by temperature fluctuations. Especially in cold weather, many users mention removing the cushion from the car; otherwise, it can become firm and hard and won’t return to its soft, supportive state until the material warms up again

item.content:encoded:
Price: $49.95 - $35.95
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:28:48 UTC – Details)



Defend Your Back Seat from Man’s Best Friend: Four layers of ultra-durable and waterproof Oxford fabric protects your car against scratches, scuffs, shedding, muddy paws, and puppy accidents!
Fits All Cars, Trucks, & SUVs: The Lusso Gear cover fits all back bench seats and is extra-large for maximum coverage. Front and side flaps provide full coverage to protect your entire seat. No more fur and mud on your upholstery!
Won’t Slip, Sag, or Slide: Install and remove your cover in a flash with security anchors and an added security strap. A non-slip backing means your cover and your dog stay put without leaving a stain on leather seats.
Seatbelt and Latch Accessible: The Lusso Gear cover never restricts access to seatbelts or latch points. It’s the perfect protector for two and four-legged passengers! The extra-wide slots make it easy to install baby and child seats.
Satisfaction Guaranteed: Cleanup is quick and easy thanks to a machine-washable cover! Wipe with a damp cloth or toss it in the wash for a deeper clean. If you aren’t satisfied with your purchase, let us know and we’ll work with you until you are.

(as of Nov 30,2022 06:19:41 UTC – Details)


Superior comfort Unlike some pillows that become flattened over time, the Samsonite lumbar support cushion will remain and never flatten thanks to the high-density memory foam structure. By attaching it to your chosen chair you are providing additional support to your lower back to help ease any discomfort. Hours spent sitting at a desk can negatively impact our posture so by using the support cushion you are creating an ergonomic experience that will provide comfort by moulding to the shape of your back.
Super easy to use Measuring 13.5 inches x 14 inches x 4.5 inches, the lumbar support cushion features an integrated adjustable strap that allows an easy and secure fit to most chairs including office swivel chairs, car seats, truck seats, dining chairs, plane seats and more, and wheelchairs. The convenient slider buckle positioned on the strap can be positioned easily for you to achieve the perfect fit. It only takes a moment to set your cushion up for a more comfortable sitting experience.
BUY NOW and support your lower back throughout the day with the lumbar support pillow from Samsonite
Mesh Cover
NEVER FLATTENS – give yourself superior lumbar support with our back support pillow. Designed to hold its shape even after multiple uses, it will never flatten down or thin out so you will always receive comfortable support wherever you choose to use it. The support pillow helps to improve posture and provide comfort whilst you sit and eat, drive, work, watch TV, read and so much more.
JUST THE RIGHT SUPPORT – the high-grade memory foam is perfectly firm, so you won’t find it too soft or too hard. Designed to suit most adults who require a lumbar support pillow for office chair, car or other seating option. Featuring an ergonomic curve, it sits perfectly against your back once secured in place providing you hours of comfort when you’re working or driving.
IMPROVE YOUR SITTING POSTURE – if you sit for long hours at a time in an office or drive long distances on a regular basis then you can create a more comfortable seating position by attaching our lumbar support pillow to your seat or chair. It is designed to offer support to your lower back thanks to the integrated memory foam which provides cushioning as you sit.
MULTIPURPOSE DESIGN – featuring an easy to use, adjustable strap you can use the lumbar support pillow in the workplace on your office chair, when relaxing at home, while driving your car on road trips, and on plane seats when flying. It is also great for adding to a wheelchair for more comfort and gamers love it for extra support when gaming. If you choose to use the lumbar support pillow for car journeys it will always remain in place, regardless of the terrain.
BREATHABLE EASY TO CLEAN MESH – the 3D mesh outer layer encourages air circulation throughout the pillow, you can remove this cover and machine wash it to keep your lumbar support pillow looking and smelling fresh. Make discomfort when sitting a thing of the past with our lumbar support pillow which will keep you stable, secure and cushioned when working, driving and relaxing.

Samsonite’s Ultimate Support for your Lower Back

This lumbar support pillow has been designed to help elevate comfort, particularly in your lower back, for those who sit for long periods of time at work, home office, or drive for long hours. This lumbar pillow keeps you sitting upright and secure throughout your busy day.

The Ideal Solution for an Office or your Home

This lumbar support pillow can be used in a wide variety of situations. Office workers find our lumbar pillow to be an essential accessory when working at their desks or home for extended periods of time as they are less inclined to slump in their chair.

Ultimate Lumbar Support for your Car

Excellent for long car journeys or those who drive long distance on a daily basis such as truck and taxi drivers or sales representatives, this lumbar pillow will help you to arrive at your destination feeling comfortable and refreshed.

Samsonite’s High-Grade Memory Foam

Each of our lumbar support pillows are made from high grade memory foam which naturally helps to mold your body to the pillow. Comfortable to use, yet firm enough to provide ultimate support, our lumbar pillow is designed to be durable and long lasting for multiple years’ worth of use. This back pillow also features a mesh, breathable outer layer to keep air circulating throughout the pillow.

Ergonomic Shape Designed to Elevate Comfort

This lumbar pillow complements your backs natural arches to elevate comfort while sitting for extended periods of time.This contoured shape of our lumbar pillow will gently help guide your lower back and spine to mold to the lumbar pillow for a secure and comfortable hold that provides maximum comfort.

4.5

(as of Nov 30,2022 06:19:41 UTC – Details)

18 Vibrant Colored Fine Liner Marker Pens from ​iBayam

Lets you express yourself with true style and color. Available in 18 colors with an ultra fine tip. The iBayam fine liner marker pen set provides bold and expressive lines and is great for editing documents and papers. This writing instrument features point guard technology to protect the felt tip, as well as a water-based ink that doesn’t bleed through paper.

MULTIFUNCTIONAL FINELINER PENS

The iBayam fine line pen set is ideal for journaling, planner, drawing lines & details, writing, sketching, adult coloring books, art projects, artists fine-ink drawings and coloring small intricate patterns. Doesn’t bleed through paper.

Classic writing tool in modern colors

Our products are comfortable to use and last long. Well, When you need precision and clarity in your color drawings. There’s no better way to get it than with a fine liner pen set!

Inspired Coloring Marker Pens, Comfortable in your daily life

Slim easy-to-control shape and a smooth fine porous point come together to help you perfect and personalize your coloring sheet. Turn everyday writing into 18 colors with iBayam fineliner Pens. Add a pop of fun color to journals, planner, notebook, notes, drawings, adult coloring pages.

Water-based ink

The water-based ink is specifically designed to reduce smearing and not bleed through paper for neat notes, doodles and adult coloring pages. Perfect for drawing lines & details, journaling, coloring, writing, sketching, marking, signing, manga, animation, graphic and design.
